name: Carlo SPINELLA v. Eugene P. PETIT, Jr.

parties: Carlo SPINELLA v. Eugene P. PETIT, Jr.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is granted. The petitioner’s motion for stay of the order suspending his license and registration is granted until further order of this court.

attorneys: Rodio, Tarro & Ursillo, Ltd., Joseph J. Rodio, Providence, for petitioner.
Stephen F. Mullen, Chief Special Counsel, Dept, of Transportation, Providence, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
Carlo SPINELLA v. Eugene P. PETIT, Jr.
No. 82-503-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Dec. 30, 1982.
Rodio, Tarro & Ursillo, Ltd., Joseph J. Rodio, Providence, for petitioner.
Stephen F. Mullen, Chief Special Counsel, Dept, of Transportation, Providence, for respondent.
